questionTitle: Which word is stressed on the second syllable?

He <u><font color='red'>drinks</font></u> <u><font color='red'>a day</font></u> <u><font color='red'>three cups</font></u> <u><font color='red'>of</font></u> water.

anwers: but on the football team also

questionTitle: his wealth, he is not luxurious.
